properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Tuscaloosa, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 9:51AM CST until February 14 at 2:18PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Locust Fork At Sayre...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Holt
Lock and Dam...Oliver Lock and Dam...and Selden Lock and Dam...

.Heavy rainfall during the past 24 hours continues to produce rises
and flooding along the Black Warrior River basin...a flood warning
remains in effect for the Black Warrior River at Holt Lock and Dam,
Selden Lock and Dam, Oliver Lock and Dam, and the Locust Fork at Sayre.
Moderate flooding is forecast to occur at Selden Lock and Dam which may
lead to residential flooding in the surrounding area.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Oliver Lock and Dam.
* until Friday afternoon...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  8:30 AM Tuesday the stage was 133.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 129 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 136.9 feet by
tomorrow morning . The river will fall below flood stage early
Friday morning.
* Impact...At 135 feet...Numerous camphouses and some permanent
residences southwest of Tuscaloosa become cutoff.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
